General.Name: China Motor Corp
General.Description: China Motor Corporation manufactures and sells automobiles and related parts and components in Taiwan and internationally. It offers passenger cars, sedans, LCV, EV, RV, AGV, trucks, electric scooters, and recreational/commercial vehicles, as well as electric motorcycles and eMoving vehicles. China Motor Corporation was incorporated in 1969 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 2, Dunhua S. Rd, Taipei, Taiwan
